text: Oke, so I found the problem myself haha, I was using the same module id for each module

Hello, Is it possible to add certain extra tags/categoriers to a blog item so I can build a filter on it?

So lets say I want to add a size.
and I consists out of 50/100/250+

Hi all. Does anyone know whether it’s possible to create custom Operations Hub data syncs? I’ve searched online, but I can’t seem to find any documentation. We need to create a custom sync to share contacts with MC Dynamics Finance and Operations ERP platform.

Hello :relaxed:
We would like to build an integration with HubSpot.
One of the criteria for this project is for our app to be discoverable in the HubSpot marketplace.
•  is there any difference to marketplace discoverability if we build this integration in-house or with a 3rd party development team?

Hi everyone, there is a private app on our HubSpot account that was developed by someone else. However, we dont' have access to the source code. Is there a way to pull that private app's code locally?

I am having an issue with search indexing. When you search for a certain blog posts, two results are displayed. One from the current blog and one from a test blog that is no longer published. When you click on the test blog article it goes to a 404 and contains the url /test-blog/ instead of /blog/. I have added the url path to be disallowed in robots.txt but the /test-blog/ article still returns in the search results. Any thoughts?

question: is there a way, at theme level, to hide the “all modules” section from the user in the page editor? some of our clients use other modules that are not ours and are reporting bugs on those :confused:
i know how to hide HubSpot modules, but we cant hide the others to prevent the use in our theme :confused:

hi everyone. i have an app that handles Custom Workflow Actions and today something really strange happend. i have one field that has type: enumeration and fieldType: checkbox, but is not showing the options anymore. could anyone help me? (the server that returns the optionsUrl is ok and works outside HubSpot api.

Hello All !

When using Active Directory (Azure) to provision and manage HubSpot accounts via SSO, is it possible for the users calendar to be automatically connected / synced to the HubSpot account ? If so, how does one go about setting this up? Thanks a bunch
